data.name: 无眠夜曲
data.detailed_description:
Introduction to the game:

Cold movement, endless reincarnation...... /b]
Only fighting to the end of the world to return to our hometown!

One of the rules of movement:
Reincarnationer must complete the main task given by the movement.

Rule 2 of the movement:
Reincarnationer is not allowed to disclose information about the movement to any plot characters.

Rule 3 of the movement:
When the Reincarnationer meets the conditions, they are allowed to return to their hometown.

How to play the game:

Players will operate through the mouse or keyboard, take risks in different styles of the world, complete the task of sleepless movement, and get rich rewards!
There are synthetic systems and multiple currency systems. Because every world has a different currency!

Game features:

Every scene is a double story! Every NPC can interact (kill)! Every world can start all over again! This is infinite flow!

Author's words:

The work of independent producer! Game content is still expanding! Any comments are welcome! Welcome to group communication! QQ Group number: 947128515

data.short_description: Use assault rifle against the magician! Or use the martial arts to smash the machine armor! Purify your blood, upgrade your skills, bring your favorite characters into the world of reincarnation! Players will operate through mouse or keyboard, adventure in a world of different styles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Any computer is possible！
